name: Wilderness (itch)
description:
Wilderness is a Top-Down Survival Shooter where you must survive the night from the diferent spirits of the forest with just five arrows.

Manage your arrows wisely and don't get killed to become an adult in this ancient ritual.

Notes:

- Play the game in "Fantastic" quality to get the best experience of it.

- Mac version doesn't support joystick.

Features

  • Non stop action
  • Easy controls
  • Defiant gameplay

Genre

Action, Shooter, Survival.
